ComicInfo.Title: Host; (Untitled); Zombie Toolshed; Cottonmouth
ComicInfo.Summary:
The cover image to this issue was famously used on various items of Carcass (UK Grind Band) merchandise and patches.

COVER/ [CONTENTS]: Bruce Spaulding Fuller
HOST: Plot/ Kevin McReavy, Script and Art/ Bruce Spaulding Fuller
(UNTITLED): Story/ Bill Townsend, Art/ Greg Capulo
ZOMBIE TOOLSHED: Story and Art/ Bruce Spaulding Fuller
COTTONMOUTH: Story and Art/ Steve Bissette
